title: The Scout's Temptress
description: I will protect her against anybody, even my people, she is MINE!Scarlet: He saved me, he betrayed me only to save me again from an alien race. Can I trust him with my body and heart after what he did?Balda'Har: They said humans are evil, that their females would tempt me. But if Scarlet is an evil temptress, I will surrender myself gladly to her. And die for her if necessary.But first I need to win her love back.â˜…TRIGGER WARNING, THIS BOOK IS SLIGHTLY MORE INTENSE AND A BIT DARKER THAN THE PREVIOUS ONES.
author: Bella  Blair
